# tg_users (Data Source)

Fetches users from Trustgrid



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `email_filter` (String) Filter users by email (substring match)
- `status_filter` (String) Filter users by status (active, inactive, or omit for all)

### Read-Only

- `emails` (Set of String) List of matching user emails
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `users` (List of Object) List of users (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users))

<a id="nestedatt--users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `users`

Read-Only:

- `email` (String)
- `policy_ids` (List of String)
- `status` (String)
- `uid` (String)
